title: Drum Set
info: The Drum Set is a novelty furniture item used in conjunction with the Drumstick to produce drum sounds. The Drum Set and Drumstick can be purchased from the Merchant after one of the following bosses is defeated: Eater of Worlds, Brain of Cthulhu, Skeletron, or Wall of Flesh.
stat:
Use time12 (Very fast)
TooltipPlayable next to Drum Set
'The coffee is strong...and vulgar'
Rarity00*
Buy50
Sell10
Research1 required
